newsitem.title: USA: PSINet teams up to offer Internet service.
newsitem.headline: PSINet teams up to offer Internet service.

text.p: PSINet Inc, CyberCash Inc and Mercantec Inc said Wedneday they have introduced PSIWeb eCommerce, a service for businesses seeking to sell products and services on the Internet.
The service is being made available immediately with PSIWeb, a World Wide Web hosting service of PSINet Publishing Corp.
CyberCash will provide the electronic payment system, which is designed to process purchases securely.
Mercantec's SoftCart software will be used to keep track of each customer's purchases and set up the payment method and shipping.
CyberCash is based in Reston, Va. Mercantec is based in Lisle, Ill.
